name: TEREOS
goal: Tereos est un transformateur de matières premières agricoles (betteraves, céréales) en sucre, amidon, alcool, éthanol.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Politiques agricole, commerciale, R&D, Energie Climat, Transport, Environnement, Brexit, renewable energies
